params.name: id
params.description: This is used for the main component and to compose id attribute for each item.

params.name: namePrefix
params.description: Optional prefix. This is used to prefix each `item.name` using `-`.

params.name: items
params.description: An array of input objects with name, value and classes.

params.name: id
params.description: Item-specific id. If provided, it will be used instead of the generated id.

params.name: label
params.description: Item-specific label text. If provided, this will be used instead of `name` for item label text.

params.name: value
params.description: If provided, it will be used as the initial value of the input.

params.name: errorMessage
params.description: Options for the error message component. The error message component will not display if you use a falsy value for `errorMessage`, for example `false` or `null`.

params.name: fieldset
params.description: Options for the fieldset component (for example legend).

params.name: classes
params.description: Classes to add to the date-input container.

params.name: attributes
params.description: HTML attributes (for example data attributes) to add to the date-input container.

params.name: values
params.description: An optional object use to specify value attributes for the date parts without setting rows.

params.name: values.day
params.description: Value attribute for the day input.

params.name: values.month
params.description: Value attribute for the month input.

params.name: values.year
params.description: Value attribute for the year input.
